MAS Motoring is an independent Sussex driving school formed of British School of Motoring (BSM) trained, male and female Approved Driving Instructors (ADIs). We offer professional one to one training in manual vehicles. Both theory and practical elements of the driving test are covered for all levels of drivers, whether it's your first time or you are returning to lessons after a break.

All our instructors offer a structured learning process with various teaching aids including a student record of achievements files and mock practical tests with a different instructor to provide positive feedback and a realistic test scenario.

Our fleet of vehicles consist of the latest Vauxhall, Ford and Citroen range, presented to the highest standards and all instructors are committed to providing an exceptional level of service at all times.

If it’s a career change you’re looking for, we also now offer Driving Instructor Training.

We offer very competitive rates with discounts available for block bookings or tailor made packages to meet your requirements. So, if you're looking for male or female driving instructors in Brighton or most areas of Kent and Sussex, you're in the right place!

Mas-Motoring offers a competitive franchise plan giving you the freedom of being your own boss, with the sales, marketing and training support of an established and respected company, plus working within a great team!
values.name: MAS Motoring
North Colorado Data Storage
values.description:
North Colorado Data Storage is a full service backup media storage company.  By providing scheduled and emergency media pickup and media delivery along the Colorado Front Range, we can provide excellent service 24 hours a day to your location, in your town; Denver Metro Area, Boulder, Longmont, Fort Collins, Greeley, Cheyenne Wyoming, Brighton, Loveland, and all other towns in-between.

VAULT360 at North Colorado Data Storage, is a state of the art FIRELOCK vault that will store your private information, and ensure redundant security and disaster protection. Because we specialize in offsite media storage, we understand the exact conditions that are necessary to protect and prolong the life of your media. 

NCDS sells all types of backup media and storage cases. We can provide competitive pricing and volume discounts.

NCDS is an expert on disaster recovery plans and business continuity. Let us help you create a plan specialized for you and your organization. We can also provide a detailed framework for you to get started on your own, creating a comprehensive disaster recover / business continuity plan.

NCDS is committed to providing the best storage solution for our clients. NCDS knows that every client is different, and has different offsite storage needs. We offer flexible and customizable services to facilitate our customer's individual needs.

The HGA Group is a sales and marketing company representing the leading manufactures of food service equipment.

We aim to cultivate customer loyalty by listening to, caring about and providing our customers and clients with top level service; to enhance a high level of ethics, excellence, innovation and integrity; to attract, develop and retain a superior team; to be focused, sensitive and responsive to our employees; and to enhance long-term relationships with our manufacturers and their people through professional execution of their policies and programs.

The HGA Group has a history of representing the leading manufacturers of food service equipment that spans 70 years. This continuity and experience provide the foundation of a tightly focused group of people that are dedicated to the support of the products our companies produce. HGA has offices in Brighton and Grand Rapids, Michigan, as well as Fishers and Ft. Wayne, Indiana.

The aim of our sales and marketing group is to develop and retain market share for the manufacturers we represent by working with the leading food service equipment dealers, specifiers and operators before, during and after the products are sold. Our credo is, “To stay a step ahead, we must lead the way.”
values.name: The HGA Group

Goldstone Homes Limited
values.description:
Goldstone Homes Limited provides all your building trades under one roof for Brighton & Hove as well as the surrounding areas. We offer a range of services for Homeowners, Landlords and Letting agents as well as Commercial Customers. 

We can provide a reactive same day service and also provide planned property maintenance. Some projects will require a multiple of trades but we project manage the whole process as part of the service. With this it gives you, the customer, the peace of mind that all trades work is overseen, completed on time and to a high standard.

We are able to offer fixed price tradesmen to cater for your needs in the following areas:

Handyman
Electrical
Plumbing & Heating
Kitchen & Bathrooms
Roofing & Glazing
Decorating & Tiling
Plastering & Rendering
Landscaping
Cleaning

Goldstone Homes is devoted to producing a high quality product for its end user. We are very much customer focused and look at each project individually, taking into consideration the clients requirements and needs and what you are looking for from us. We are committed to the project from inception through to completion, delivering on time and within your budget; something that so many Contractors fail to achieve. We feel confident in making this promise due to our vast experience and knowledge of the industry.

For more examples of our work just log on to www.goldstonehomes.co.uk or give us a call today on 01273 455934

You can have a look at some of my recent projects on my website.
values.name: LoisDesigns

values.description:
Bolney Wine Estate, the vision of Janet and Rodney Pratt, is situated on a hill which was part of the Butting Hill One Hundred, listed in the Doomsday Book.

Village tradition has it that the Prince Regent was a frequent visitor to Bolney when travelling to Brighton, staying at Bolney Lodge of which Bolney Wine Estate formed a part in the 18th Century.

We started back in 1972 as Bookers Vineyard, with three acres of vines. We have, since those early days, grown to 39 acres and have become specialist red
 
wine producers. It has been an interesting journey, with a few changes of winemaker along the way, until Samantha Linter took over in the 1990s.

Many national and international awards have been won and we are very proud of our achievements to date but we are continually aiming to improve the quality of our wines and in 2005 we invested in a state-of-the-art winery, with help from a DEFRA grant, which really and truly takes us towards our goal of making top quality red, white and traditional method sparkling wines.
values.name: Bolney Wine Estate

values.description:
Whether you are a firm of solicitors, a legal department or an individual solicitor or legal professional I can help you develop your practice or career.  I match aspirations and provide long term recruitment solutions.

My focus is largely on private practice firms and qualified solicitors. Working with firms to identify individuals to help push their businesses forward. Whilst helping solicitors develop their careers according to their personal needs and goals.

Based in Suffolk my immediate focus in on East Anglia and the North Home Counties, however I have helped firms and solicitors from Brighton to Newcastle-upon-Tyne. I regularly help solicitors relocate their working lives away from London either closer to their homes or just for a better work/life balance.

Honouring and Celebrating Life

The Southern Metropolitan Cemeteries Trust (SMCT) is a community based, not-for-profit organisation, committed to serving the needs of our communities.

Formed in March 2010 under the Cemeteries and Crematoria Act 2003, SMCT is accountable to the Department of Health and administers Bunurong and Cheltenham Memorial Parks, Brighton General, Cheltenham Pioneer, Dandenong Community, Melbourne General, Springvale Botanical and St Kilda cemeteries.
 
As a not-for-profit organisation, the Trust is responsible for the care and long term maintenance of these eight distinctive cemetery locations. To ensure that the locations will be maintained for future generations, a percentage of revenue is allocated to a Preservation Fund. This fund ensures that resources will be available to maintain all eight cemeteries in perpetuity (for all time).
 
Over and above the funeral services we provide, we are committed to guiding families through the most important, long term decisions they will need to make when someone dies.
 
We also recognise our responsibilities as custodians of history.
 
Historic and iconic, the cemeteries and memorial parks within our care are beautiful, tranquil and distinctive destinations to honour and celebrate life.
values.name: Southern Metropolitan Cemeteries Trust

values.description:
Beyond Retro offers the leading selection of handpicked vintage clothing to style conscious shoppers.

The large-scale, show-stopping stores are a dazzling celebration of style through the decades. The first Beyond Retro opened in a disused dairy in East London, where they quickly built up a reputation for being an innovative retailer with a rock 'n' roll heart.  Beyond Retro is  a trailblazer, selling 20th-century fashion in all its outrageous and exotic glory. Led by instinctive fashion forecasting and staffed by creative individuals, the company continues to source original wares and kick-start trends.

The vibrant spirit of the original East London scene is an integral part of the shopping experience in every Beyond Retro store. It forged humble beginnings in Brick Lane; it now has stores in Stockholm, Gothenburg, Soho, Brighton and Dalston! As the vintage vision is brought to more people across the world with its internationally available online store, Beyond Retro retains its original cultural essence with the nostalgia that’s intrinsic to the Beyond Retro world.

Beyond Retro go to great lengths to find fashion forward originals and never fail to filter a spectacular collection of vintage designs. Beyond Retro’s vintage heart continues to celebrate the sartorial secrets of bygone eras. From corsets to couture, pencil skirts to punk and everything in between, chronicling a century of magnificent style; Beyond Retro welcomes you to their world!
values.name: Beyond Retro
Proud Robinson
values.description:
Proud Robinson is a small but perfectly formed communications agency, based by the sea in Brighton but working all over the world, helping to realise the ambitions of clients like Nissan, Deutsche Telekom, T-Mobile, Flash Entertainment & Ministry of Sound.

Thinkers & Doers, Dreamers & Believers, Proud yet Humble, Captains & sometimes Pirates, Diplomats & occasionally Scapegoats, we’ve been called many a thing, but if pushed to describe what we really do, we would simply say “cool sh*t that makes people think differently”. 

'Cool sh*t' isn’t a line you’ll find in most budgets, so whilst a lot of what we do would often be called PR or Experiential (we don’t buy audiences, we create interest), we’d rather be thought of as Brand Engineers. 

Not Brand Architects or Communications Consultants, who will sell you a dream without having stood in your shoes & understanding if it is achievable (or will actually work), but people who (thanks to decades of experience) are able to understand how every single aspect of what a brand does influences consumer behaviour. 

From product design through to packaging, pricing, distribution strategy & of course marketing, we understand that everything you do has an impact on what people think of you. 

Having worked above, below & more often than not, right up to the line, we understand where all these things fit in & how the sorts of real world brand experiences we create can make a difference.

Brand Engineering : just the sh*t that works…

Fortune Financial Services, Inc. is a premier independent broker dealer located in the historic town of New Brighton, Pennsylvania. For nearly two decades we have been providing financial solutions for our advisors and their clients offering a full compliment of mutual funds, annuities, and other insurance products.

Our goal is to treat our representatives and their clients in a way that is mutually respectful, honest, and friendly. Through the years this commitment has allowed Fortune to build strong relationships with our financial representatives.  Our representatives know they can count on us to provide them the tools necessary to help them build their business.

We also understand that just about every broker dealer offers many of the same products. But what makes Fortune Financial Services stand out is that we still do business the ‘Old Fashion Way.” That is, we have to earn the trust of our representatives every day.
values.name: Fortune Financial Services, Inc.
